item.title: About
item.description: Noah is an aspiring data scientist, based in Cambridge, MA. This website was built using the blogdown package in R. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

Noah Landesberg Cambridge, MA noah.landesberg@gmail.com Experience athenahealth Aug 2016 - Present Millennium Management Jun 2015 - Aug 2015 Education The Johns Hopkins University Bachelor of Arts in Public Health Studies
